Package fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.timer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Timer
    A timer class which display time according to the delays specified in the TimerConfig using the abstract method Timer.sendTimeMessage(String).
    TimerConfig
    Configuration of a Timer class.
